title: In Melbourne Tonight
brief_description: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.

constellations_other.name: 1950s television
constellations_other.description: "Good evening ... and welcome to television." Bruce Gyngell’s famous words launched television in Australia in 1956 on Sydney’s TCN9, with the medium finally arriving in the country towards the later end of the decade.

description: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.
description_for_label: In Melbourne Tonight, also known as “IMT”, was a highly popular nightly variety television show produced at GTV-9 Melbourne from 6 May 1957 to 1970.
